data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Wellington, New Zealand.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wellington, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 82,003 believers in Wellington that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Wellington, New Zealand need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 82,003 believers in Wellington to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Hindi people. Make the Hindi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Wellington.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Wellington. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who are far from you in Wellington. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
